biotools.summary: Implementation of seven methods for topology-based pathway analysis of both RNASeq and microarray data: SPIA, DEGraph, TopologyGSA, TAPPA, PRS, PWEA and a visualization tool for a single pathway.

bioschemas.name: ToPASeq
